001package edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.controller;
002
003import android.content.Context;
004import android.content.Intent;
005import android.content.res.Resources;
006import android.os.Bundle;
007import android.view.LayoutInflater;
008import android.view.Menu;
009import android.view.MenuInflater;
010import android.view.MenuItem;
011import android.view.View;
012import android.view.ViewGroup;
013import android.widget.Spinner;
014import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
015import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
016import androidx.core.view.MenuProvider;
017import androidx.fragment.app.Fragment;
018import androidx.lifecycle.Lifecycle.State;
019import androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner;
020import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelProvider;
021import androidx.navigation.NavController;
022import androidx.navigation.Navigation;
023import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.R;
024import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.adapter.GuessesAdapter;
025import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.adapter.SwatchesAdapter;
026import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.databinding.FragmentGameBinding;
027import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.model.entity.Game;
028import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.model.entity.Guess;
029import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.viewmodel.CodebreakerViewModel;
030import java.util.List;
031import java.util.Map;
032import java.util.function.Function;
033import java.util.stream.Collectors;
034import java.util.stream.IntStream;
035import java.util.stream.Stream;
036
037public class GameFragment extends Fragment implements MenuProvider {
038
039  private FragmentGameBinding binding;
040  private CodebreakerViewModel viewModel;
041  private GuessesAdapter adapter;
042  private Map<Integer, String> colorNameLookup;
043  private Map<Integer, Integer> colorValueLookup;
044  private Map<Integer, Integer> colorPositionLookup;
045  private int codeLength;
046
047  @Override
048  public void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) {
049    super.onCreate(savedInstanceState);
050    setupColors();
051  }
052
053  private void setupColors() {
054    Resources res = requireContext().getResources();
055    int[] colorValues = res.getIntArray(R.array.color_values);
056    String[] colorNames = res.getStringArray(R.array.color_names);
057    colorNameLookup = Stream.of(colorNames)
058        .collect(Collectors.toMap((name) -> name.codePointAt(0), Function.identity()));
059    colorValueLookup = IntStream.range(0, colorNames.length)
060        .boxed()
061        .collect(Collectors.toMap((pos) -> colorNames[pos].codePointAt(0), (pos) -> colorValues[pos]));
062    colorPositionLookup = IntStream.range(0, colorNames.length)
063        .boxed()
064        .collect(Collectors.toMap((pos) -> colorNames[pos].codePointAt(0), (pos) -> pos));
065  }
066
067  @Override
068  public View onCreateView(
069      @NonNull LayoutInflater inflater, ViewGroup container, Bundle savedInstanceState) {
070    // load and bind layout.
071    binding = FragmentGameBinding.inflate(inflater, container, false);
072    binding.submit.setOnClickListener((v) -> submitGuess());
073    binding.goToScores.setOnClickListener((v) -> {
074      NavController controller = Navigation.findNavController(binding.getRoot());
075      controller.navigate(GameFragmentDirections.navigateToScores(codeLength));
076    });
077    // TODO: 2/7/2024 Initialize any view widgets, as necessary.
078    return binding.getRoot();
079  }
080
081  @Override
082  public void onViewCreated(@NonNull View view, @Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
083    super.onViewCreated(view, savedInstanceState);
084    requireActivity().addMenuProvider(this, getViewLifecycleOwner(), State.RESUMED);
085    // Connect to viewmodels.
086    SetupViewModels();
087  }
088
089  @Override
090  public void onDestroyView() {
091    binding = null;
092    adapter = null;
093    super.onDestroyView();
094  }
095
096  @Override
097  public void onCreateMenu(@NonNull Menu menu, @NonNull MenuInflater menuInflater) {
098    menuInflater.inflate(R.menu.game_options, menu);
099  }
100
101  @Override
102  public boolean onMenuItemSelected(@NonNull MenuItem menuItem) {
103    boolean handled = true;
104    int itemId = menuItem.getItemId();
105    if (itemId == R.id.new_game) {
106      adapter = null;
107      viewModel.startGame();
108    } else if (itemId == R.id.settings) {
109      NavController controller = Navigation.findNavController(binding.getRoot());
110      controller.navigate(GameFragmentDirections.navigateToSettings());
111    } else {
112      handled = false;
113    }
114    return handled;
115  }
116
117  private void SetupViewModels() {
118    ConnectToViewModel();
119    LifecycleOwner owner = getViewLifecycleOwner();
120    ObserveGame(owner);
121    ObserveInProgress(owner);
122  }
123
124  private void ConnectToViewModel() {
125    viewModel = new ViewModelProvider(requireActivity()).get(CodebreakerViewModel.class);
126    getLifecycle().addObserver(viewModel);
127  }
128
129  private void ObserveGame(LifecycleOwner owner) {
130    viewModel
131        .getGame()
132        .observe(owner, this::handleGame);
133  }
134
135  private void handleGame(Game game) {
136    List<Guess> guesses = game.getGuesses();
137    if (adapter == null) {
138      adapter =
139          new GuessesAdapter(requireContext(), guesses, colorNameLookup, colorValueLookup);
140      binding.guesses.setAdapter(adapter);
141      createSpinners(game);
142    }
143    adapter.notifyDataSetChanged();
144    binding.guesses.post(() -> binding.guesses.smoothScrollToPosition(guesses.size() - 1));
145    codeLength = game.getLength();
146  }
147
148  private void ObserveInProgress(LifecycleOwner owner) {
149    viewModel
150        .getInProgress()
151        .observe(owner,
152            (inProgress) -> {
153              int visibility = inProgress ? View.VISIBLE : View.INVISIBLE;
154              binding.colorSelectors.setVisibility(visibility);
155              binding.submit.setVisibility(visibility);
156            });
157  }
158
159  private void createSpinners(Game game) {
160    int codeLength = game.getLength();
161    List<Guess> guesses = game.getGuesses();
162    int[] selectedItems = guesses.isEmpty()
163        ? new int[codeLength]
164        : guesses
165            .get(guesses.size() - 1)
166            .getContent()
167            .codePoints()
168            .map(colorPositionLookup::get)
169            .toArray();
170    Context context = requireContext();
171    binding.colorSelectors.removeAllViews();
172    LayoutInflater layoutInflater = getLayoutInflater();
173    for (int i = 0; i < codeLength; i++) {
174      Spinner spinner = (Spinner)
175          layoutInflater.inflate(R.layout.color_spinner, binding.colorSelectors, false);
176      spinner.setAdapter(new SwatchesAdapter(context));
177      spinner.setSelection(selectedItems[i]);
178      binding.colorSelectors.addView(spinner);
179    }
180  }
181
182  private void submitGuess() {
183    String guess = IntStream.range(0, binding.colorSelectors.getChildCount())
184        .mapToObj((pos) -> (Spinner) binding.colorSelectors.getChildAt(pos))
185        .map((spinner) -> (String) spinner.getSelectedItem())
186        .map((colorName) -> colorName.substring(0, 1))
187        .collect(Collectors.joining());
188    viewModel.submitGuess(guess);
189  }
190
191}
